title: The $300 Pocophone F1 Amazed Me.
description: For $300 the Pocophone F1 has the same specs as a $1000 smartphone.  POCOPHONE Official Website: POCOPHONE Facebook: POCOPHONE Instagram: POCOPHONE Twitter:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
